Documentation

Everything you need to know about using ResumeIt.ai to optimize your job search and land your dream job

Quick Start Guide

1

Install Extension

Add ResumeIt.ai to your browser from the Chrome Web Store

2

Create Account

Sign up for free and verify your email address

3

Upload Resume

Upload your current resume or create one from scratch

4

Optimize

Find a job posting and let our AI optimize your resume
